title: Sources: Xavier's Miller agrees to coach Horns
content: Sean Miller, who has led teams to 13 NCAA tournament appearances, including two of the past three seasons at Xavier, will be the new coach at Texas, sources told ESPN.

title: Worthy sues ex-fiancée, alleges extortion, abuse
content: Chiefs wide receiver Xavier Worthy is suing his former fiancée in Williamson County, Texas, alleging she engaged in extortion and assaulted him.

title: NC State rides record-setting treys into Sweet 16
content: Two-seed NC State is headed to the Sweet 16 after the Wolfpack hit an NCAA tournament program-record 15 threes to beat Michigan State 83-49 in the women's second round.

title: Sources: Patriots match Raiders' bid for LB Elliss
content: The Patriots are matching the Raiders' offer sheet to restricted free agent linebacker Christian Elliss, sources told ESPN.

title: Gophers hire Medved as men's basketball coach
content: Minnesota has announced the hiring of Minneapolis native and Colorado State coach Niko Medved as its next men's basketball coach. Medved's season ended Sunday as the Rams lost at the buzzer to 4-seed Maryland.

title: Tiger confirms dating Trump's ex-daughter-in-law
content: "Love is in the air," said Tiger Woods, as he went public to confirm he's dating President Trump's former daughter-in-law Vanessa Trump, 47.

title: Day says Ohio State to visit White House April 14
content: Ohio State coach Ryan Day confirmed Monday that the Buckeyes national championship football team will visit the White House on April 14.

title: Why the NBA could be headed for 'worst tanking stretch we've ever seen'
content: Teams are getting really good at tanking. Can the NBA do anything more to stop it? Here's what's next for the race to the bottom.

title: From a $765 million signing to the new Evil Empire: The moves that sent shock waves through MLB
content: Juan Soto got how much!? The Dodgers added how many stars? It's time to get up to speed after a wild winter.

title: Will Atlanta or New York bring home the inaugural SoFi Cup?
content: Can Justin Thomas lead Atlanta Drive GC to the title or will Xander Schauffele and New York Golf Club lift the trophy? We break down the first TGL championship match.

title: Aaliyah Chavez's unlikely route to top girls basketball prospect
content: As a college decision looms, the sought-after point guard reflects on a late start but quick rise in the game.

title: Post-free-agency NFL Power Rankings: How all 32 teams stack up, plus under-the-radar moves
content: Which NFL teams improved this offseason, and which took a step back? Our panel of experts ranked them from 1 to 32.

title: NHL playoff watch: Can the Canucks get back on track?
content: Vancouver needs every point it can get, including tonight against New Jersey. Plus, full playoff projections.

title: Women's March Madness Day 3 guide: Analysis and recaps as half of Sweet 16 set
content: Half the Sweet 16 is set. No. 5 seeds Tennessee, Ole Miss and Kansas State and a pair of 1-seeds won on Day 3.

title: Loss to Canada closes out miserable window for Pochettino's USMNT
content: The USMNT defense looked helpless in Sunday's Concacaf Nations League defeat to Canada. And has Christian Pulisic run out of gas?

title: Yamal hits back at Van der Vaart after Spain win
content: Lamine Yamal has quipped back at Rafael van der Vaart's "pants down" jibe after helping Spain beat Netherlands in Sunday's UEFA Nations League quarterfinal.

title: Mexico wins 1st Nations League on late penalty
content: Raúl Jiménez scored his second goal on a penalty kick in second-half stoppage time as Mexico beat Panama 2-1 Sunday night at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California, to win the Concacaf Nations League tournament for the first time.

title: Poch: U.S. has 'time' to fix issues before World Cup
content: After suffering two defeats in the Concacaf Nations League, United States manager Mauricio Pochettino insisted that his side still has enough time to turn things around before the 2026 World Cup.

title: Ball boy hailed as hero as Germany oust Italy
content: Germany's 5-4 aggregate win over Italy on Sunday earned them a spot in the Nations League last four and also created an unlikely new hero: a rookie ball boy.

title: Marsch sent off during Canada win over USMNT
content: Canada coach Jesse Marsch was shown a direct red card during early in the second half of his team's 2-1 Concacaf Nations League third-place match win over the United States on Sunday.

title: You da' Maignan: 'Difference' in goal, Mbappé says
content: France produced a great attacking performance to overturn a two-goal deficit against Croatia and level their Nations League tie on Sunday, but it was keeper Mike Maignan who stole the spotlight with his penalty heroics in a 5-4 shootout victory.

title: Newcastle Women draw record 38,502 crowd
content: Newcastle United's women's side smashed the Women's Championship attendance record on Sunday, drawing 38,502 fans for their clash against Sunderland.

title: MLS: Charlotte sneaking up on league's best
content: Vancouver isn't the only surprise contender in 2025 as Charlotte is turning heads in our MLS Power Rankings.

title: Inside the incredibly high-risk, low-reward LeBron James bet
content: LeBron James' streak of scoring 10 points in a game continues, but with significant money on the line each game, two people are paying attention to this trend more than most.

title: Why George Foreman will be remembered as 'That Guy'
content: George Foreman was a champion, but for a lot of nonboxing fans, he will be remembered for so much more.

title: Keeping up with Nolan and Jared Jones, and other weekend news
content: Eric Karabell keeps tabs on the baseball world and tells you what is relevant to fantasy baseball managers.

title: Red Bull's Lawson predicament is a mess of its own making
content: Red Bull had a Sergio Pérez replacement in house. Instead, it chose Liam Lawson, who's underwhelmed in 2025.

title: Ferrari's Shanghai debacle: Explaining Hamilton, Leclerc DQs
content: Why were both Ferraris disqualified in China, and how costly could that be in the constructors' title fight?

title: Lewis Hamilton dons red on historic EA Sports F1 25 Iconic Edition cover
content: The newly minted Ferrari driver takes the spotlight on the Iconic Edition with his first-ever solo appearance.

title: Grant Ellis' next chapter: How basketball built 'The Bachelor' star
content: Former Iona Gaels guard Grant Ellis, once too focused on earning his spot  to think about dating, is now the star of "The Bachelor."

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye swoop for Semenyo, Kerkez
content: Liverpool are looking to land Bournemouth full-back Milos Kerkez or forward Antoine Semenyo. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Eight reasons why Juventus fired Thiago Motta, and three lessons for the rebuild
content: After a month in which Juventus crashed out of the Champions League and the Coppa Italia, they finally parted ways with manager Thiago Motta. Here's why they did it and what else the club needs to fix.

title: Dhankhar discusses judicial accountability with Nadda, Kharge
content: Move comes in the wake of alleged cash recovery from the official premises of a Delhi High Court judge; Mr. Dhankhar says they had decided to wait for the outcome of the CJI-appointed in-house inquiry panel

title: I won’t apologise, I don’t fear this mob: Kunal Kamra
content: The stand-up comedian has said that he is willing to co-operate with the police and courts for any lawful action against him

title: Centre issues guidelines to tackle high rate of deletions of MGNREGS job-cards
content: In a guideline recently circulated to the States, the government wants the job-cards intended for deletions to be verified by the gram sabha and the workers be made aware of the appeal process

title: Concerted efforts being made to make NTR district TB-free: official
content: Awareness rally held from the Old Government General Hospital to mark World Tuberculosis Day; 6,404 people in the district received treatment for TB last year, says District TB Prevention Officer

title: Explore taking up Polavaram-Banakacherla linkage project in operation model, suggests naidu
content: Detailed Project Report for the linkage should be completed by June 20, and the project should receive Central Water Commission approval by October 20, CM directs officials

title: Maharashtra government seeks Kunal Kamra’s apology for his joke on Shinde
content: BMC razes illegal structure outside studio, hours after Shiv Sainiks vandalise the place; Mumbai Police arrest 12 Sainiks including Shiv Sena social media in-charge, all released on bail

title: Teachers’ association, educationists urge Karnataka govt. to continue guest teachers’ service till April-end
content: As per the rules, the guest teachers’ service will end by March 31, 2025. However, the academic year 2024-25 will end on April 10, 2025, and schools will declare summer vacation. After that, other processes, including school enrollment, will continue.

title: India addressing supply chain vulnerabilities to secure trade routes: Sonowal
content: At Singapore Maritime Week, the Union Ports, Shipping and Waterways Minister said that as a reliable and responsible partner, India is committed to building a green, secure, and inclusive maritime future

title: Tariffs, market access for agricultural goods on agenda as U.S. trade delegation visits India
content: The five-day visit by assistant trade representative Brendan Lynch comes ahead of April 2 reciprocal tariffs

title: RSS wants to destroy India’s education system, Rahul tells student leaders
content: The Narendra Modi government’s model is to hand over all resources to Adani and Ambani and hand over institutions to the RSS, the Leader of the Opposition Rahul Gandhi said

title: Telangana Education Commission proposes Bill to regulate school and junior college fees
content: It prohibits school managements from collecting additional fees under the labels of donation fee,  books fee, etc.

title: Bihar Governor appeals to people to build a golden future on the basis of the State’s glorious past
content: He emphasizes that the people of Bihar are very intelligent and hard working and they have an important role in the development of other States and big cities of the country.

title: Let Abhishek Mohanty continue in Telangana till CAT finalises his plea challenging allocation to A.P.: HC
content: Telangana High Court directs Centre, A.P., and Telangana to allow IPS officer Abhishek Mohanty to serve in Telangana till CAT adjudicates his plea

title: Nagpur authorities raze homes of violence accused, HC halts further demolition
content: The Municipal Corporation officials demolished the two-storey residence of Fahim Khan and a balcony of the residence of Yusuf Sheikh. Terming the action ‘high-handedness’, the Nagpur Bench of the Bombay High Court questions why the owners were not issued a notice that the construction was illegal. “Is the NMC targeting the petitioners based on their religion?” it asks.

title: Assembly defers passing Private Universities Bill
content: Discussion on Bill lasted over two hours. Postponement attributed to time constraints as House could not conclude the proceedings by the scheduled time of 6 p.m.

title: CM announces intensified campaign to combat narcotics abuse
content: State to devise a comprehensive enforcement, social awareness, prevention and de-addiction strategy after the police identify narcotic drug abuse, chiefly the abuse of “wakefulness drugs” from the meth family, as a driver of recent violent crimes

title: 100% of electricity consumers to pay smart meter costs installed by around 2%
content: Among one crore consumers in Bescom jurisdiction, around 3 lakh (around 2%) are estimated to get smart meters, said officials

title: India Navy announces maiden India-African exercise, Indian Ocean Ship (IOS) Sagar
content: The maiden initiatives of IOS Sagar and AIKEYME are aimed at consolidating Indian Navy’s stature as the ‘Preferred Security Partner’ and ‘First Responder’ in Indian Ocean Region, according to Deputy Chief of Naval Staff

title: HC notices to TGPSC over Group-I main exam evaluation system
content: The petitioners contended that TGPSC while disclosing list of evaluators of different subjects, did not reveal in which language the experts were familiar with, which could impact those who wrote the exam in Telugu

title: Hubballi-Dharwad Municipal Corporation is in fiscal distress, says floor leader Viranna Savadi
content: The floor leader of the ruling party in the municipal council has said that it has come about because of the State govt.’s failure to release grants

title: UDF, BJP slam Kochi Corporation Budget
content: UDF terms it a debt- and user fee-driven Budget that will increase the financial burden on city residents

title: No sanctioned Tamil teachers in Kendriya Vidyalayas, only 24 part-time teachers, Union Minister informs Lok Sabha
content: Kendriya Vidyalayas are mandated to have a uniform scheme of education. Therefore, the sanctioned posts of language teachers are those of Hindi, English, and Sanskrit. However, there is a  provision for teaching of other languages for the willing students, Minister of State for Education Jayant Chaudhary

title: Toddy shop licensees seek probe into closure of Chittur shops
content: Kerala Toddy Shop Licensee Association demands investigation into closure of 21 toddy shops due to cough syrup presence.

title: Koutala police help build home for homeless orphan sisters
content: Under the ‘Police Mee Kosam,’ programme, the police constructed a house for the sisters in Bodampally, providing them with shelter and security

title: Telugu Desam Party MP alleges massive liquor scam in Andhra Pradesh between 2019 and 2024
content: The YSR Congress Party monopolised liquor production, engaged in large-scale financial misconduct and diverted public funds abroad says Lavu Sri Krishna Devarayalu demanding probe

title: ‘Savukku’ Shankar’s home ransacked; mother files complaint
content: Mr. Shankar took to social media to share posts of a video call made by one of the trespassers after grabbing his mother’s phone. Police were deployed at his home to prevent further untoward incidents.

title: Telangana’s PDS reforms a model for India: Secretary
content: Use of technology in Fair Price Shops have led to major seizure, ensured savings, food security and SKOCH Award

title: BJD pushes for 27% reservation for OBCs in jobs, education in Odisha
content: Despite OBCs comprising 54% of State’s population, they don’t have any reservation in educational institutes, says senior BJD leader Arun Sahoo

title: CBI arrests four, including NHAI official, for bribery to process private company bills related to contracts
content: In searches at the premises of the accused, the agency has recovered about ₹1.8 crore in cash and several incriminating documents and digital devices

title: Controlled fire mooted to maintain forest ecosystems
content: Kerala Forest department and tribespeople suggest controlled fire to mitigate human-animal conflict and maintain biodiversity in State.

title: Tamil Nadu to experience simmering summer as day temperature is set to rise from March 25
content: Dry weather will gradually return to the entire State by March 27, says RMC; it also warns that high maximum temperature and humidity, coupled with night temperature that is above normal by two to three degree Celsius, may lead to uncomfortable weather in some places till March 28

title: Intensified TB elimination campaign will be expanded to all districts, says Health Minister Nadda
content: Under the 100-day TB-Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan, 12.97 crore people were screened for TB with over 7.19 lakh TB patients notified across India

title: Andhra Pradesh: Chief Secretary calls for acceleration of RTGS data integration process
content: K. Vijayanand asks heads of departments who were yet to submit their data to do so expeditiously to facilitate the creation of data lake

title: Mayor dubs Kochi Corporation Budget people-friendly
content: Budget proposals, such as issuing health cards, will prioritise marginalised segments before being expanded to cover the entire population of the city, says Mayor

title: Karnataka Chief Minister tells KMF that Cabinet will take a call on hike in milk price
content: If the government agrees to the hike, the entire amount should be transferred to farmers, Siddaramaiah instructs Karnataka Milk Federation

title: Centre concerned over hospitals not sharing organ transplant data
content: Health Ministry writes to States expressing “serious concern” over non-compliance of rules under THOTA. Such non-compliance undermines NOTTO’s ability to fulfil its mandated obligations and impedes the overarching objective of augmenting organ donation rates nationwide, a NOTTO communication said.

title: High-Level Committee report on accident at pharma company in Anakapalli district deficient, allege retired scientists
content: ‘It lacked essential details required for verification and analysis, and that the HLC visited the plant five weeks after the incident’

title: A.P. government to renovate 76 temples with ₹143 crore
content: The State government is likely to bring a new policy on leasing of temples’ properties in cities and towns, says Endowments Minister

title: Sengottaiyan asks govt. to rescind nod for dye factory on the banks of the Bhavani
content: He says around 40 lakh people depend on the river for drinking water and setting up a factory will affect them

title: Liquor prohibition a failure in Bihar, has spoiled careers of youth, says BJP leader
content: Former Union Minister R.K. Singh demands the Nitish Kumar-led government review the prohibition policy

title: Parents of Walayar girls move Kerala HC challenging chargesheet against them
content: Court issues notice to CBI. Petition seeks directive to CBI to conduct a further investigation from the homicidal angle

title: Justice Yashwant Varma transfer: Allahabad High Court Bar Association calls for strike
content: Maintaining its strong opposition against transfer of Justice Varma to parent Allahabad HC or its Lucknow Bench, the Bar Association once again said Allahabad High Court is not a dumping ground for corrupt and tainted judges

title: TTD cancels land allotted to Mumtaz hotels at Alipiri; focus is on resolving land disputes, says Chairman
content: The temple trust board aligns only Hindus to serve the institution and explore feasibility of transferring the staff of alien faiths to alternative governmental institutions, without affecting their dignity

title: Challenging the narrative: Why Pak is afraid of Mahrang Baloch
content: Balochistan faces heightened tensions as Pakistan battles a growing insurgency, highlighted by the Balochistan Liberation Army's deadly train hijacking. The arrest of human rights advocate Mahrang Baloch has sparked international outrage and intensified protests against alleged enforced disappearances and extrajudicial killings, with activists demanding transparency and an end to suppression of Baloch voices.

title: IPL: Incredible Ashutosh snatches win for DC from the jaws of defeat
content: Ashutosh Sharma led Delhi Capitals to a thrilling last-over victory against Lucknow Super Giants, smashing an unbeaten 66 off 31 balls at the IPL 2025 opener. Despite a shaky start and a daunting target of 210, Sharma's composed and aggressive batting ensured a stunning one-wicket win. The young batter roared in celebration, swinging his bat and gesturing animatedly toward the Delhi Capitals dugout after sealing a breathtaking chase.

title: 57-year-old actress goes viral after sharing struggles in emotional YouTube video
content: Celeste Gay, once a well-paid FedEx manager, pursued her lifelong dream of acting but ended up broke and homeless at 57. Sharing her struggles on YouTube unexpectedly went viral, attracting massive support and empathy from viewers and celebrities alike. Her story highlighted her sacrifices and endeavors, resonating deeply with many who also face similar challenges.

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk: 'No more loans to...' as DOGE fights loan fraud
content: Elon Musk supports the new SBA policy to prevent fraud involving stolen Social Security numbers, requiring applicants’ date of birth for direct loans. Measures include halting loans for those under 18 or over 120 years old, addressing past fraudulent cases and improving data integrity in federal loan programs.

title: Columbia folds, academia buckles: How Trump is reshaping US higher education
content: Columbia University's concessions to comply with President Trump's administration, including banning face masks during protests and giving arrest powers to campus security, have raised concerns in academia. These measures aim to reclaim educational institutions from left-wing ideology, affecting federal funding, research projects, and academic freedom, as other universities brace for similar pressures.

title: 'Don't panic but ...': Immigration lawyers to Indians with Green Cards
content: With heightened scrutiny from the US government, Indian green card holders are concerned about their status. Experts advise that as long as they adhere to US laws, maintain strong ties, and avoid long stays abroad, they have little to fear. Important documentation and lawful compliance are crucial.

title: Amazon CEO to employees: We are changing how we do promotions
content: Amazon's CEO Andy Jassy has announced a shift in the company's promotion strategy, focusing on smaller, efficient teams rather than larger fiefdoms. Highlighting the impact of smaller teams in past successes, Jassy emphasized meritocracy and getting things done for customers over bureaucracy. He urged employees to work fast, think like owners, and adapt to intense competition.

title: 24 posts a day, four hours of sleep —Trump on a social media tear
content: In the middle of the night, the President expressed his anger over a distorted portrait of himself in Colorado's State Capitol, blaming the state's Democrat Governor Jared Polis. He also criticized CBS for a 'puff piece' on George Clooney and slammed The New York Times for biased reporting.

title: 'We are not sure who opens yet': Punjab Kings coach ahead of GT clash
content: As the Punjab Kings prepare for their IPL 2025 opener against Gujarat Titans, the team is still deciding on its opening combination. Under the leadership of Shreyas Iyer and guidance of Ricky Ponting, they focus on a cohesive and dynamic unit. Assistant coach Brad Haddin remains optimistic and praises Iyer's leadership, emphasizing readiness and team culture.

title: Rippling co-founder Prasanna Sankar on run, claims divorce harassment on Twitter
content: Prasanna Sankar, co-founder of Rippling, has accused his wife of infidelity and filing false legal claims against him, leading him to flee with his son from the Chennai police.

title: 'Will check Kamra's call records, bank details': Maha govt amid joke row
content: Maharashtra's junior home minister, Yogesh Kadam, announced that the government will investigate comedian Kunal Kamra's call recordings and bank statements after he called deputy CM Eknath Shinde a 'gaddar' during a Mumbai show. Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Nirupam claimed Uddhav Sena funded Kamra's show and issued a warning to the comedian while party workers vandalized the hotel's venue in response.

title: Bulls party on D-Street, but is the stock market rally sustainable?
content: Since March 17, BSE Sensex has risen over 5.6% or 4,302.47 points, while the broader 50-share index Nifty50 has also rallied over 5.6% or 1,261.15 points.  But is the current stock market rally sustainable? Are foreign investors conclusively back on D-Street? Here’s why market experts are cautious:

title: No fancy furniture, Elon Musk has plastic chairs in his house, reveals Trump aide
content: ​"So his house is 1,200 square feet. It's got the furniture in it that I had when I graduated from college. And I am not kidding. It's a 1,200 square feet house and it has plastic chairs," Donald Trump's commerce secretary Howard Lutnick said describing his first meeting with Elon Musk on the day SpaceX caught a rocket on landing.

title: Bihar Board Intermediate result 2025 to be declared tomorrow
content: The Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) will announce the Intermediate Exam 2025 results on March 25 at 1:15 PM. The results will be available on official websites, and students must keep their credentials ready to check them. Those seeking re-evaluation or compartment exams can follow the board’s guidelines. Stay updated through official sources.

title: Sidhu hails Dhoni and Kohli as 'institutions' of cricket, not just icons
content: Navjot Singh Sidhu lauds MS Dhoni and Virat Kohli as "institutions" of cricket, highlighting their legendary status, leadership, and global impact. Kohli's charisma and Dhoni's inspiring leadership, even at 43, were praised. Sidhu emphasized their enduring influence on future generations and the extraordinary respect they command in the cricket world.

title: 'Impeach Justice Varma ... will not tolerate transfer': Allahabad HC Bar chief
content: The Allahabad High Court Bar Association has condemned the transfer of Justice Yashwant Varma from Delhi High Court following a cash recovery from his residence. The association demanded a CBI and ED investigation and called for impeachment proceedings, questioning the fairness of the judicial appointment system.

title: KL Rahul and Athiya Shetty blessed with a baby girl
content: India cricketer KL Rahul and Athiya Shetty welcomed a baby girl on Monday. While Athiya announced the news through Instagram, Rahul missed his debut match for Delhi Capitals against Lucknow Super Giants due to personal reasons, although detailed information was not provided at the game toss.

title: Philadelphia Eagles eye bold draft trade with Rams
content: The Philadelphia Eagles hold eight picks in the 2025 NFL Draft. General Manager Howie Roseman might trade assets to move up in pursuit of Ole Miss defensive tackle Walter Nolen. Given their history of strengthening the defensive line, adding Nolen could further boost their elite defense. Fans eagerly await Roseman's draft day strategies.

title: 6 6 6 6 4 - Nicholas Pooran smashes 28 runs in an over against Delhi Capitals
content: Nicholas Pooran's explosive 75 off 30 balls, featuring seven sixes and six fours, powered Lucknow Super Giants to 209/8 against Delhi Capitals in their IPL 2025 opener. Pooran decimated part-timer Tristan Stubbs, earning 28 runs from a single over. Complemented by Mitchell Marsh's 72, this dominant batting display has set a strong start for the Super Giants' campaign.

title: Nagpur riot: Bombay HC halts demolition of homes linked to accused
content: The Bombay High Court's Nagpur bench has temporarily halted the demolition of homes linked to those accused in recent riots, citing the need for legal review. The court questioned the Nagpur Municipal Corporation's action following arguments about arbitrary demolitions and violation of Supreme Court guidelines.

title: TTD temple trust to ink pact with Google to rollout AI pilgrim services
content: Tirupati's TTD trust partners with Google to implement AI for smoother pilgrim services and reduce waiting times. Additionally, TTD resolves land allocation issues, initiates new temple construction trust, plans accommodation renovations, and re-evaluates VIP darshan slots.

title: 'Snow White' underperforms with $87.3 million opening weekend collection
content: Disney's live-action 'Snow White' opened to a disappointing $43 million at the box office despite a $250 million budget. The film faced controversies over CGI dwarfs and comments by star Rachel Zegler, alongside poor reviews. Globally, it earned $87.3 million, falling short of expectations, raising questions about Disney's strategy for future live-action remakes.

title: IPL: MI head to Jamnagar for team bonding activities before GT clash
content: Mumbai Indians suffered a loss in their IPL 2025 opener against Chennai Super Kings. Battling on a sluggish pitch, MI's batting faltered despite some individual performances. Hardik Pandya's absence was felt, but his return is expected soon. Promising signs include Vignesh Puthur's impressive debut. The team now focuses on recuperation and bonding before preparing for the Gujarat Titans match.

title: Instant Scholar: Hawking's thesis on 'Properties of Expanding Universes'
content: Stephen Hawking's 1966 PhD thesis, Properties of Expanding Universes, laid the groundwork for his renowned contributions to cosmology and black holes. It explored singularities, the role of general relativity, and how the universe expands. His work provided vital theoretical support for the Big Bang model.

title: Liquor bottles, threats and theft: Coimbatore trio arrested after video go viral; watch
content: Three youths were arrested by Kattoor police in Coimbatore for drunken driving, violating traffic rules, and holding liquor bottles while on a scooter. They went viral on social media, and after further investigation, it was found they also threatened and robbed a civilian. The trio, identified, were remanded in judicial custody.

title: Are your bank deposits insured if bank fails?
content: Bank depositors are covered by the DICGC's insurance scheme up to Rs 5 lakh per account. Strategically distributing deposits across various banks can enhance coverage, as personal accounts, business accounts, and different joint arrangements are treated separately.

title: IPL 2025: Why KL Rahul is not playing Delhi Capitals' opening match
content: KL Rahul's debut for Delhi Capitals was delayed due to the birth of his first child. He missed the IPL 2025 opening match against Lucknow Super Giants, as Athiya Shetty, his wife, shared the news on social media. Rahul is expected to rejoin for the next game against Sunrisers Hyderabad.

title: Will Nikola Jokic play tonight against the Chicago Bulls?
content: Nikola Jokic is expected to return soon after missing four games due to an ankle injury, as confirmed by coach Michael Malone. While he’s unlikely to play against the Chicago Bulls, he may return during Denver's upcoming five-game homestand. Jokic remains crucial for the Nuggets as they push for a deeper postseason run.

title: 'Batting first, batting first': Pant teases Axar as DC opt to bowl vs LSG - Watch
content: Axar Patel and Rishabh Pant, now captaining opposing IPL teams, shared a friendly moment during the coin toss. Axar, Delhi Capitals skipper, won the toss and chose to bowl first. Pant, leading Lucknow Super Giants, showed a positive attitude. Their camaraderie highlighted their mutual respect, despite the new rivalry as team captains.

title: From Arnab to VHP: 5 times Kunal Kamra courted controversy
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra has faced violent backlash and legal trouble after calling Maharashtra's deputy CM Eknath Shinde a 'gaddar'. This incident adds to Kamra's history of controversies, including clashes with journalist Arnab Goswami, mocking Kangana Ranaut, a contempt of court case, and a conflict with OLA Electric.

title: 'Lied to Parliament': Kharge on BJP's 'Cong to change Constitution' claim
content: Congress leader Malliakarjun Kharge intends to pursue legal action against BJP's JP Nadda and Kiren Rijiju for allegedly making false claims that Congress is providing reservations based on religion in Karnataka. This follows a heated debate in Parliament over the issue, with Kharge asserting that the BJP is raising the issue to distract from its corruption.

title: India to conduct joint naval exercise 'Aikeyme' with 10 African nations
content: India will conduct its first major naval exercise named `Aikeyme` with 10 African nations and launch `Indian Ocean ship (IOS) Sagar` initiative next month. These efforts aim to enhance maritime security in the Indian Ocean Region (IOR) and solidify India’s role as a preferred security partner. Aikeyme exercise will involve various countries focusing on marine drills and rescue operations.

title: 'Calling gaddar a gaddar': Shiv Sena (UBT) backs Kamra, target Shinde
content: Uddhav Thackeray expressed support for Kunal Kamra regarding his 'gaddar' comment towards Eknath Shinde. Thackeray clarified that calling a 'gaddar' is not an attack. He disassociated Shiv Sena from recent vandalism acts, attributing them to the 'gaddar sena.' Meanwhile, a BMC inspection identified unauthorized structures at Kamra's show venue for removal.

title: Athiya Shetty-KL Rahul welcome baby girl; celebs congratulate couple
content: Actor Athiya Shetty and cricketer KL Rahul have stepped into a new phase of their lives—parenthood! The couple has welcomed their baby girl and shared the heartwarming news with their fans on March 24 via social media. Throughout her pregnancy, Athiya delighted fans with glimpses of her journey, including a stunning maternity shoot with her husband. Just a few days ago, the duo posted breathtaking pictures on Instagram, announcing their excitement

title: Why Usha Vance is an 'unwelcome visitor' in Greenland
content: The timing of the visit has only heightened tensions. Greenland held parliamentary elections earlier this month, resulting in a loss of majority for Egede’s Inuit Ataqatigiit party. Though he remains the caretaker prime minister, coalition talks are ongoing. Jens-Frederik Nielsen, whose party is expected to lead the next government, also criticized the visit.

title: Sensex surges over 1,000 points: Top reasons for D-Street rally
content: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, rallied strongly in trade on Monday. While the BSE Sensex went above 78,100 level, Nifty50 crossed 23,700 intraday.

title: Dwayne Wade's wife Gabrielle Union shares how his decision helped family
content: Dwayne Wade, the NBA legend, shared his journey about his December 2023 cancer diagnosis and successful surgery, where a cyst was removed from his kidney. His wife, Gabrielle Union, provided an update, expressing their relief and peace as he is now cancer free. Wade's openness about his experience aims to inspire and support others facing similar challenges.

title: 'Uddhav funded Kamra's show': Sena's big claim on comic's 'gaddar' remark
content: Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Nirupam accused Kunal Kamra of making a derogatory comment about Maharashtra deputy CM Eknath Shinde, claiming the show was funded by the Uddhav Thackeray faction. Nirupam warned Kamra and stated that legal action would follow if he does not apologize. Kamra's parody referred to Shinde as a 'traitor', prompting backlash from Shiv Sena workers.

title: Sona Mohapatra slams Salman Khan over 31-year age gap remark
content: Singer Sona Mohapatra has criticized actor Salman Khan for his response to discussions about the significant 31-year age gap between him and his Sikandar co-star Rashmika Mandanna. She called him the "bhai of toxic masculinity." On Monday, Sona took to X (formerly Twitter) to call out Salman’s statement justifying the age difference. Salman had earlier remarked that if Rashmika and her father had no issue, others should not be concerned.

title: Centre notifies increase in salary, pension for MPs
content: The central government has increased the salaries, allowances, and pensions of MPs and former MPs by 24% effective April 1, 2023. MPs will now earn Rs 1.24 lakh per month, with daily allowances and pensions for former MPs also being raised. This marks the first revision since 2018, aligning with the Cost Inflation Index.

title: Bhabhiji Ghar Par Hain writer Manoj Santoshi passes away
content: Manoj Santoshi, a well-known television writer for the hit comedy show Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain, passed away on March 23, 2025, due to a liver-related illness. His death marks a significant loss for the Indian television industry where he made considerable contributions.

title: Watch: BMC officials arrive at Habitat studio with hammers amid Kamra row
content: BMC officials inspected Unicontinental Mall in Mumbai and found an unauthorized temporary shed, after Shiv Sena workers vandalized Habitat Studio over comedian Kunal Kamra's joke about Eknath Shinde. Habitat Studio temporarily shut down in response. An FIR was registered against key participants in the vandalism.

title: Dodgers' Betts still dealing with stomach illness
content: baseball shortstop Mookie Betts is still dealing with an illness . he hasn't been able to keep down solid food without vomiting for two weeks . Betts has lost about 15 pounds during that time . the perennial All-Star says all his blood work and other routine testing have been normal .

title: Stunning scissor kick wins People's Puskas award for best amateur goal
content: the eight nominees for the "People's Puskas" award are revealed . the award is given to the player considered to have scored the "most beautiful" goal of the year . since its inaugural year in 2009, 37.5% of the winning goals have been bicycle kicks .

title: Forecaster for Week 1: March 27-30
content: fantasy baseball managers in leagues with daily transactions will lock at the scheduled start time of each player's game on any given day . if you have not yet drafted, keep in mind that players will be locked in the roster spots you select them with . all Cubs and Dodgers from the Tokyo Series will still be able to start, sit, IL, add and/or drop Cubs .

content: new Zealand qualify for the 2026 world cup with a 3-0 defeat of New Caledonia . the all whites are the second nation through to the tourna tour . new Zealand qualified for the tournament for the first time since 2010 . click here for all the latest sports news .

title: Road to the men's Frozen Four: Complete schedule, teams at a glance
content: the 2025 men's hockey tournament is set, with the 16-team bracket in place . all games will air on the ESPN networks and stream on ESPN+ . the winners of the six conference tournaments win automatic NCAA berths .

title: "Will The Law Equally Deployed Against...": Kunal Kamra On Studio Vandalism
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra condemned the demolition of a studio in Mumbai where supporters of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde barged in and protested against his jokes on Mr Shinde.

title: US Gold Card Scheme A Hit? Trump's Top Official Says "1,000 Sold In A Day"
content: Donald Trump's 'Gold Card' or 'Golden Visa' scheme, which offers permanent residency and optional citizenship of the United States for $5 million, per card, seems to have become a hit, if US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's claim is indeed true.

title: "Come To Tamil Nadu...": Kunal Kamra To Shiv Sena Supporter In Viral Call
content: As Kunal Kamra battles a fresh controversy over his comments against Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, a recording of a purported phone call by a Shiv Sena supporter threatening the stand-up comedian has gone viral.

title: US Green Card, H-1B Visa, F-1 Visa Holders Cautioned Over Travelling Abroad
content: Due to the Trump Administration's massive crackdown on immigrants - both illegal and legal - key immigration agencies of the US have enhanced scrutiny of those travelling abroad and even more greatly heightened checks for those returning to the US.

title: "No Regrets, Will Apologise Only If...": What Kunal Kamra Told Mumbai Cops
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra has told Mumbai Police he does not regret his comment about Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, sources told NDTV Monday afternoon.

title: Chennai Techie Accuses Wife, Cops Of Harassment, She Calls Him 'Sex Predator'
content: The tech entrepreneur alleged that his wife "abducted" their nine-year-old son to the US, forcing him to file an international child abduction case.

title: "Apologise For What Happened On Show, Will Ensure No Recurrence": Samay Raina
content: Comedian Samay Raina on Monday expressed regret over a series of remarks that were made on his now-deleted web show "India's Got Latent", and promised to be more careful in ensuring that such incidents are not repeated, sources said.

title: "Bruised My Spirit": On Kunal Kamra Controversy, Film-Maker Recalls Own Ordeal
content: Film-maker Hansal Mehta today came out in support of comedian Kumal Kamra, who is being targeted over his comments on Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde.

title: Woman Spikes Husband's Food, Kills Him With Mother's Help In Bengaluru: Cops
content: A 37-year-old real-estate businessman was allegedly murdered by his wife and mother-in-law over his alleged multiple extramarital affairs and illegal business dealings in Bengaluru last week, police said on Monday.

title: IPL 2025: Ashutosh Sharma The Hero As DC Script Miracle 210-Run Chase vs LSG
content: Delhi Capitals vs Lucknow Super Giants Highlights, IPL 2025: Ashutosh Sharma took DC to victory vs LSG, from 65/5 at one stage. Rishabh Pant made a six-ball duck.

title: Greenland Furious, Will Boycott US Second Lady's Visit Amid Buyout Threats
content: Displeased would be an understatement to describe the way leaders in Greenland are feeling about the planned visit of the Second Lady of the United States, Usha Vance.

title: Huge Row In Rajasthan Over Rana Sanga Explained
content: A massive row over history is brewing in Rajasthan after a Samajwadi Party leader made a remark about Rana Sanga, the 16th Century ruler of Mewar, that riled up the leaders in Rajasthan, where Rana Sanga and his grandson Rana Pratap are revered.

title: Meerut Killers Muskaan, Sahil Made A Mistake That Cost Them Heavily
content: Meerut's Muskaan Rastogi and her lover Sahil Shukla, accused of brutally murdering her husband Saurabh Rajput, had a plan to dispose of the body once they were back from their Himachal vacation

title: Centre Given 4 Weeks To Decide On Rahul Gandhi's Dual Citizenship Case
content: The Lucknow bench of the Allahabad High Court has given Union Home Ministry has been given four weeks to decide on the issue of Congress MP Rahul Gandhi's citizenship.
